values: 相信；依赖；托付；信任；信赖；委托；托管；信托；财产；委托管理；信托基金；受托团体
信任；依赖；倚仗；希望；相信（某人的善良、真诚等）；委托；托付；赊账；寄希望于；把…委托给别人照料；对…抱有信心

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 移交（财产或管理权）给受托人
托管；托管制度；托管人职责；托管领土

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指单纯从主观上的相信，不着重这种相信是否有根据。
多指根据长期交往或实践，对某人某事有了认识和了解后产生的信心和相信，侧重其坚定性。
语气较强，强调完全相信；有时也能仅凭感觉产生的相信。
强调相信、信任的完全可靠。
指对某人某事有充分信心，断定不会使人失望，因而给予信任。
语气最弱，着重以声誉为信任的基础。
侧重忠诚可靠与可信赖。
指在相信的基础上可进一步依靠，着重可靠性。
指绝对相信或信赖某人。
普通用词，常表示一种缓和、不太肯定的口气。

word_group.brief_definition: 相互信任；互信；互相信任
某人做某事乃意料中事；某人（会去）做某事乃其天性使然；某人定会去做某事

word_group.phrase: not trust someone as far as one can throw them

word_group.brief_definition: 托管；保管的；受委托管理

bilingual.source: Karen provided me with trust and support.
bilingual.target: 凯伦给了我信任和支持。

bilingual.source: Day by day, I learnt to trust people.
bilingual.target: 一天天地，我学会了信任别人。

bilingual.source: You can trust them to look after the house.
bilingual.target: 你可以信任他们照看房子。

bilingual.source: These three things are friendship, effort and trust.
bilingual.target: 这三件事是友谊、努力和信任。

bilingual.source: The first step is to find someone you trust to talk to.
bilingual.target: 第一步是找到你信任的人谈谈。

bilingual.source: I trust him a lot and know he will always be there for me if I am in trouble.
bilingual.target: 我非常信任他，并且知道如果我有困难，他总会在我身边。

bilingual.source: I give the yellow rose to my parents for teaching me that love is about trust.
bilingual.target: 我把黄玫瑰送给我的父母，因为他们教会我爱是关于信任的。

bilingual.source: At first, it's a bit difficult to trust new people, but after a while, it gets easier.
bilingual.target: 起初，信任新朋友有点困难，但过一段时间就会变得容易。

bilingual.source: Treated this way, you're sure to feel hurt – we should always be able to trust those closest to us, and it hurts even more when we find we can't.
bilingual.target: 这样对待你，你一定会感到受伤——我们应该总是能够信任最亲近的人，当发现不能信任时会更痛苦。

bilingual.source: She misplaced her trust in someone who didn't deserve it.
bilingual.target: 她放错地方了信任，信任了不值得信任的人。

list.abstract: trust（英 [trʌst]，美 [trʌst]），英文单词，作名词为信任；信赖；信托等。作动词为信任；信赖；赊账等。短语搭配有build up trust（建立信任）。例句为Most people didn't trust Shang Yang.（大多数人不信任商鞅。） trust相关名词近义词有duty、liability等；反义词有distrust、mistrust。trust表示“交由…管理”时，可以用trust sb with sth 或trust sth to sb，但不能用trust sb for sth。
trust是一首由贾斯汀比伯演唱的歌曲，收录于《Purpose》中。

yingyinNormal.en: No, of course. We need to earn their trust.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然，我们需要赢得他们的信任。

yingyinNormal.en: He told me not to trust anyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他让我别相信任何人。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't trust them. I trust you. Now why would you trust us? You barely know us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不信任他们，我信任你们。你为什么相信我们？你又不认识我们。

yingyinNormal.en: How could any of us even trust each other? It's not about trust. It's about staying alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家怎么可能会互相信任呢？根本不需要信任，我们的目标是活下去。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't know who we can trust anymore. Do we? Trust, or fear? In your case, mostly fear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们是不是谁也不能信任了？你是信任我，还是怕我？你现在看起来感觉害怕多一些。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you trust me? Or don't you? Because if you don't, get someone else to write it. Or write it yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你信任我吗，还是不信任？你如果不信任我，就另找人写吧，或者你自己写。

yingyinNormal.en: Whatever you did, why wouldn't you trust me with it? People who care about you are supposed to trust you with stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不管你当初做了什么事，你怎么就不能信任地告诉我呢？真正在乎你的人，应该信任你，敢于告诉你。

yingyinNormal.en: But they have given us no reason not to trust them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我们没理由不信任他们啊。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. You don't know? Do you trust me? Of course I do! Well, maybe you shouldn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道。你不知道？你信任我吗？当然了，那或许你不该信任我。

yingyinNormal.en: Po, I know I'm the last guy you wanna trust right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿宝，我知道我现在是你最不愿信任的人。

yingyinNormal.en: What about copies? He says there aren't any. And you trust him?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有副本吗？他说没有。你信任他吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't believe it. This is a terrible betrayal of my trust.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是难以置信，这是对我信任莫大的背叛。

yingyinNormal.en: I was sent to kill the Chancellor to regain their trust.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我奉命前来刺杀总理，以重新赢得他们的信任。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you blame me if I find it difficult to trust you right now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我觉得现在很难信任你，你会怪我吗?

yingyinNormal.en: And they never faltered, not even once. I could trust them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们从来不哆嗦，一次也没有，我十分信任它们。

yingyinNormal.en: And ask yourself, can you trust the people you're working with?
yingyinNormal.zh: 问问你自己，你信任与你一同共事的那些人吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Tonight is all about starting over. I trust you and him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚应该忘记过去，重新开始了，我信任你...还有他。

yingyinNormal.en: Why would they take away our keys? Maybe they don't trust us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们为什么要拿走我们的钥匙？或许他们不信任我们。

yingyinNormal.en: If this is gonna work, you are gonna have to trust me. Can you do that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们俩要想走下去 你必须得信任我，可以吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Fusco? Your name sounds familiar. He's my partner. You can trust him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 弗斯科？这名字很耳熟。他是我搭档，可以信任。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 相信; 信任; 信赖

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 相信某人的；轻信的；不怀疑的
v. 委托；托付；委托看管

word_family.mean: n. 信任；信赖；信托；财产信托；受托团体；商业信用；受托；期待；信托基金公司；信托履行协议

sense_info_list.en: rely on the truthfulness or accuracy of
sense_info_list.zh: 相信; 信任; 信赖

examination_example.sentence: A Knight Foundation focus-group survey of young people found they use "distributed <highlight>trust</highlight>" to verify stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 骑士基金会对年轻人的焦点小组调查发现，他们使用“分布式信任”来验证故事。

examination_example.sentence: Today many people find it difficult to <highlight>trust</highlight> their own opinion and seek balance by gaining objectivity from external sources.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，许多人发现很难相信自己的观点，并通过从外部获得客观性来寻求平衡。

examination_example.sentence: Permission to run a nuclear plant is a public <highlight>trust</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 允许使用核能源是公众的信任。

sense_info_list.en: an arrangement whereby a person (a trustee) holds property as its nominal owner for the good of one or more beneficiaries

examination_example.sentence: Ms Denham chose to concentrate the blame on the NHS <highlight>trust</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德纳姆女士选择将责任归咎于NHS信托。

examination_example.sentence: The information commissioner, Elizabeth Denham, has issued her damning verdict against the Royal Free hospital <highlight>trust</highlight> under the NHS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信息专员伊丽莎白·丹汉姆对英国国民健康服务体系下的皇家自由医院信托基金做出了严厉的裁决。

examination_example.sentence: Octavia Hill launched the National <highlight>Trust</highlight> not to rescue stylish houses but to save "the beauty of natural places for everyone forever."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥克塔威亚·希尔发起了全国托管协会，目的不是为了拯救那些华丽时尚的豪宅，而是“为所有人永久保留自然美的地方。”

sense_info_list.en: commit (someone or something) to the safekeeping of
a large company that has or attempts to gain monopolistic control of a market
hope and expect that something is true

word_usage.usage: trust作名词，表示“对……的信任；信赖”时，常用搭配trust in sb.

trust作动词时，既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。
作及物动词时，其后可接名词、代词或由wh-/that引导的从句，如：You can't trust what the newspapers say. 你不能相信报纸上说的话。
作不及物动词时，后面常跟介词in或to，如：She needs to trust more in her own abilities. 她需要更多地相信自己的能力。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 相信; 信赖; 认为...可靠

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 反托拉斯的；反垄断的
adj. 不可信赖的；不可信任的
adj. 值得信赖的；可信的
v. 委托；托付；委托看管

word_family.mean: n. 信任；信赖；信托；财产信托；受托团体；商业信用；受托；期待；信托基金公司；信托履行协议

sense_info_list.en: rely on the truthfulness or accuracy of
sense_info_list.zh: 相信; 信赖; 认为...可靠

examination_example.sentence: But I think when we get feedback from someone we <highlight>trust</highlight>, we understand that the feedback isn't some kind of personal attack.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我认为，当我们从我们信任的人那里得到反馈时，我们会明白，这些反馈并不是某种人身攻击。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Trust</highlight> their gut instinct.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相信他们的直觉。

examination_example.sentence: When you have 30 odd options, <highlight>trusting</highlight> your gut is not practical.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你有30多种选择时，相信你的直觉是不现实的。

examination_example.sentence: They get to know me and to <highlight>trust</highlight> me, knowing for sure I'm not selling them something.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们开始认识我并信任我，知道我不会向他们卖任何东西。

sense_info_list.en: an organization or company managed by trustees
commit (someone or something) to the safekeeping of

word_usage.usage:
表示“相信，信赖”时，可以说trust in sb/sth，但不可以说trust on sb./sth.。
示例：他相信他的朋友们。
误 He trusted on his friends.
正 He trusted in his friends.

表示“交由…管理”时，可以用trust sb with sth 或trust sth to sb，但不能用trust sb for sth。
示例：我将把生命交付于他。
误 I will trust him for my life.
正 I will trust him with my life.
正 I will trust my life to him.

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Trust</highlight> her own judgment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相信她自己的判断。

examination_example.sentence: His boss has a lot of <highlight>trust</highlight> in him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的老板很信任他。

examination_example.sentence: His immediate boss did not <highlight>trust</highlight> him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的直系上司不信任他。

word_usage.usage:
表示“交由…管理”时，可以用trust sb with sth 或trust sth to sb，但不能用trust sb for sth。
示例：我将把生命交付于他。
误 I will trust him for my life.
正 I will trust him with my life.
正 I will trust my life to him.

表示“相信，信赖”时，可以说trust in sb/sth，但不可以说trust on sb./sth.。
示例：他相信他的朋友们。
误 He trusted on his friends.
正 He trusted in his friends.

examination_example.sentence: In my opinion, whenever in trouble, we should seek help from those we <highlight>trust</highlight> most.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我看来，无论何时遇到困难，我们都应该向我们最信任的人寻求帮助。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Trust</highlight> is a learned behavior that we gain from past experiences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信任是我们从过去的经验中获得的一种习得行为。

examination_example.sentence: At some point in all of our lives, we'll have our <highlight>trust</highlight> tested or violated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们生命中的某个时刻，我们的信任会受到考验或被侵犯。

受托团体; 信托基金机构

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 值得信赖的；可信的

word_family.mean: n. 信任；信赖；信托；财产信托；受托团体；商业信用；受托；期待；信托基金公司；信托履行协议

sense_info_list.en: rely on the truthfulness or accuracy of
sense_info_list.zh: 相信; 信任; 信赖

examination_example.sentence: Most people didn't <highlight>trust</highlight> Shang Yang.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人不信任商鞅。

examination_example.sentence: In the past, most Western people thought Chinese products were unable to be <highlight>trusted</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过去，大多数西方人认为中国产品不可信赖。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Trust</highlight> people even if they give you a reason not to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信任别人，即使他们给你一个不信任的理由。

sense_info_list.en: an organization or a group of people that invests money that is given or lent to it and uses the profits to help a charity
sense_info_list.zh: 受托团体; 信托基金机构

examination_example.sentence: For the past fifteen years, a charity called the Woodland <highlight>Trust</highlight> has been recording ancient trees in the country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在过去的十五年里，一个名为林地信托的慈善机构一直在记录该国的古树。

examination_example.sentence: Since the database was set up, the Woodland <highlight>Trust</highlight> has added over 180,000 trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从数据库建立以来，林地信托已经增加了 180,000 多棵树。

examination_example.sentence: You can take an active part in the Woodland <highlight>Trust</highlight>'s project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以积极参与林地信托的项目。

word_usage.usage:
表示“相信，信赖”时，可以说trust in sb/sth，但不可以说trust on sb./sth.。
示例：他相信他的朋友们。
误 He trusted on his friends.
正 He trusted in his friends.

表示“交由…管理”时，可以用trust sb. with sth. 或trust sth. to sb.，但不能用trust sb. for sth.。
示例：我将把生命交付于他。
误 I will trust him for my life.
正 I will trust him with my life.
正 I will trust my life to him.
